> He looks aread of himself, shrugging. "I can't really describe him.
> You'll see him soon though."
>

{Scorpina}

    Behind the bot Scorpina frowned darkly. Either this Devilduer wasn't too
bright or the Alliance leader was rather secretive. In either case she
didn't really like the situation. She preferred knowing what her leaders
capabilities and weaknesses were...and exploit them when necessary.

    She'd meet Zardus soon enough like the bot had said so best to observe
the leaders movements now while she could...
